title: The Ball Valve Transformation â€“ GF Piping Systems expands its line of Pro Ball Valves - GF Piping Systems - Cision News
summary: GF Piping Systems, a Swiss flow solutions provider, has expanded its line of Pro Ball Valves with the introduction of the Ball Valve 546 Linear Pro and the 523 Pro. These new valves are designed to meet the demands of modern industries with features like lockable levers, reinforced security break points, and a Data-Matrix-Code for traceability. The valves are also compatible with various actuation options, including pneumatic, electric, and smart actuators, offering increased functionality and control.
product_or_process: Ball Valve 546 Linear Pro and Ball Valve 523 Pro
